code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DanhSachLop(){const{khoaId}=useParams();const[classes,setClasses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(`https://apiwebsa.onrender.com/api/lophoc?khoa_id=${khoaId}`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setClasses(data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching classes:',error));},[khoaId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto p-6 min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-green-50 to-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-green-700 text-center mb-6",children:["Danh S\xE1ch L\u1EDBp H\u1ECDc - Khoa ",khoaId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-x-auto rounded-lg shadow-lg bg-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-green-500 text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-6 py-3 text-left",children:"STT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-6 py-3 text-left",children:"M\xE3 L\u1EDBp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-6 py-3 text-left",children:"L\u1EDBp H\u1ECDc"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{className:"divide-y divide-gray-200",children:classes.map((lop,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"hover:bg-green-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-6 py-4",children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-6 py-4 font-medium text-green-700",children:lop.lophoc_id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-6 py-4",children:lop.phonghoc})]},lop.id))})]})})]});}export default DanhSachLop;
